document_data.name: ''Kanalruil''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kanalruil''''' was an enchanted [[sword]] that was once carried by the [[elf]] heroine [[Ytharra]].
document_data.Description: ''Kanalruil's'' blade was forged from blue steel covered with [[silver]] runes naming all of the [[Seldarine]] gods and goddesses. Detailed engravings and a large [[emerald]] decorated its hilt.
document_data.Powers: It was a ''+4 [[bastard sword]]''. When unsheathed, the sword offered protection from enemy weapons. It also functioned as a ''[[ring of spell storing]]''.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Ytharra was said to have used ''Kanalruil'' to slay a great [[wolf]] that threatened to devour the sun.
